text: Integration Testing for a Web App
I want to make a full integration testing for a web application.
I want to test many things like AJAX, positioning and presence of certain phrases and HTML elements using several browsers.
I'm seeking a tool to do such automated testing.
On the other hand; this is my first time with integration testing, is there any specific recommendations when doing such testing?
(As a note: My backend code is done using Perl, Python and Django.

childList.text: (As a note: My backend code is done using Perl, Python and Django.)
